messages.subject: The nicest thing anyone's said
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/10/03 2:09:26 PM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/10/03 2:09:26 PM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I asked Julian if he ever wished that he could go to a school like that.
He
said that if he had to go to school he would want it to be a Sudbury Valley
school, but that mostly he'd actually rather be with me. >>

That IS a big compliment, shucks!!
I was just thinking about you today Kathryn, I hadn't seen any posts from you
for a bit (or was I being oblivious) and was wondering how you all were.
Julian is so sweet!!

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
